ai-tha-ap250:1.2_0: Having prepared a rock, and then
ai-tha-ap250:1.3_0: I rejoice in the Buddha’s instruction.
ai-tha-ap250:1.4_0: of Vessabhū, the Lord of Men,
ai-tha-ap250:2.2_0: As a bird was worshipped by the flowers,
ai-tha-ap250:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap250:4.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pūlika.
ai-tha-ap250:5.1_0: The eighth section on the thirty-two flowers
